title: HoP 385 - I Too Can Ask Questions - Protestant Scholasticism
itunes:title: HoP 385 - I Too Can Ask Questions - Protestant Scholasticism
description: In a surprise twist, some Protestant thinkers embrace the methods of scholasticism, and even find something to admire in the work of Catholic authors like Aquinas.
